title: A Mother's Love
description: This short story was published in The Suburban Online Magazine. (April 26 2013 issue) You can read it for FREE.link to archived magazine:http://edition.pagesuite-professional...Direct link to short story:http://edition.pagesuite-professional...  Summary of story:18 year old Emily finds out that she is pregnant and procrastinates to tell her divorces parents... She finds herself in denial about her unborn child at first, but eventually warms up to the idea of being a young mother. Even though her pregnancy is not an easy one, Emily has a supporting boyfriend that tries his best to make things easier on her right up until the birth of their baby. Emily falls in love instantly.
author: Chantal Bellehumeur
